attributes.action: Undo the damage caused by round one of MTAS and reform the applications to MMC to a more standard approach.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The shambolic results of the shortlisting process of MTAS produced a list of potentially unsuitable candidates (or at least not the best candidates for the job).  Some of those candidates will be taking up places when round two is reformed to a better validated application process. We need to start again.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
